name: Box Jumper (HappyGames)
description:
Music: https://opengameart.org/content/hold-line-lospec-mix

How to Play: 

Drag the boxes to make a platform that will help you to get to the finish. There are 10 extremely hard levels...

Controls: 

WASD + Space / Arrows -> Move

LMB -> Drag the boxes

known bugs: After finnishing the game, the music will repeat every frame (sorry for your ears)

Because of the game resolution, it will be a black moldure.

This project was, almost, rushed because of some personal problems, check my other games to see that I usually polish the games :)

Good Luck Everyone!
